title: Boron-doped sulfonated graphitic carbon nitride as a highly efficient catalyst for the production of 5-hydroxymethylfurfural from carbohydrates
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Diep Dinh Le, Trinh Hao Nguyen, Luc Tan Nguyen, Dao Anh Le Nguyen, Mai Ngoc Thi Le, Khoa Dang Nguyen, Ha Bich Phan, Phuong Hoang Tran
